text: Virginia Ann Patton (June 25, 1925 - August 18, 2022) was an American businesswoman and actress. She was cast in her most well-known role as Ruth Dakin Bailey in Frank Capra's It's a Wonderful Life (1946). In 1949, Patton retired from acting. Her last role was in The Lucky Stiff (1949).
